description:
My place is close to Socrates Sculpture Park
Astoria Park
59th St. Bridge. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the outdoors space, its clean, upscale, modern and convenient to Manhattan and the heart of Astoria. My place is good for couples and business travelers. Private parking is included.
name: Apartment for rent in Astoria amenity building
review: We loved staying at Michael's place. It is a beautiful apartment with every possible appliance and comfort you would want. It is in a relatively convenient location - just a 10-minute walk to the 30th Ave N/W subway station. Michael was a great host, and was easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend staying at his place!
